item.title: Los Angeles Videographer Needed For Multi-Day Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a professional videographer to capture high-quality video footage of a series of tours and activities focusing on cultural exploration in various neighborhoods of Los Angeles. The project is scheduled for July 9th and 10th, and the videographer will be accompanying our team of researchers.

Project Overview: The objective is to capture B-roll that reflects the essence and atmosphere of each location and activity. The activities will include a mix of outdoor and indoor events TBD, which may include walking tours, art tours, and museum visits, among others.

Technical Specifications:
- High-definition video footage required.
- A mix of wide shots and close-ups to reflect diverse experiences.
- Audio capture for ambient sounds is essential, especially during tours.

Logistics:
- The activities will be both outdoors and indoors, with exact meet-up times and locations confirmed closer to the date.
- We require dynamic footage capturing interactions, detailed shots of art and artifacts, and panoramic shots of venues.
- Raw footage should be transferred to a jump drive post-event; no editing required from your side.

Timeline and Cost: Please indicate your availability for the mentioned dates and provide any preliminary costs associated with the shooting days. We aim to finalize details ASAP for smooth project coordination.

If you are interested in helping us visually capture the vibrancy and impact of this cultural immersion project, please apply with your portfolio and any compensation expectations.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:59 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Reel Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled editor to take our already recorded and edited long form content and transform it into short form reels. The primary task will be to select the most impactful moments from the original content and create engaging reels that capture the essence of the full content. Additional editing is not required, as the content has already been edited. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for storytelling and the ability to work efficiently with existing footage. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the reels are seamless and visually appealing.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Strong communication skills

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Trailer, Video Production
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Trailer, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.description:

The videographer will be responsible for capturing high-quality footage, editing the video, and adding any necessary graphics or effects. We are looking for someone who has a creative eye, excellent attention to detail, and a good understanding of visual storytelling.

- Video editing
- Storyboarding

item.title: Video Editing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We seek a Video Editing Specialist to create engaging video content for our innovative sleep products. If you have a passion for video production and a keen eye for detail, this is for you!

Why Join Us?
- Award-winning products: Recognized for quality and innovation.
- Supportive environment: Encourages teamwork and open communication.

Responsibilities:
- Edit product demos and other footage.
- Add graphics, text, animations, voiceovers, music, and sound effects.
- Use AI tools for enhanced editing.
- Perform color correction and grading.
- Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
- Collaborate with the Digital Marketing team.

Qualifications:
- 3+ years in video production and editing.
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or Avid Media Composer.
- Experience with AI editing tools.
- Strong understanding of video equipment.
- Excellent storytelling and communication skills.
- Strong portfolio.
- Up-to-date with video editing and AI trends.

Additional Skills:
- Audio editing.
- Special effects and motion graphics.
- Attention to detail.
- Creativity.
- Visual sense.
- Problem-solving.

How to Apply:
Submit your resume, cover letter, and portfolio link. Highlight your AI video editing experience and how you stay current with trends. Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.



Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Travel Video Shoot LA - Upwork
item.description:
I’m interested in hiring a videographer to shoot a contemporary afternoon tea scene at the Langham Pasadena on June 29 at 1:30pm. Availability required between 1:15 and 3:15p . The shoot should last about 60-75mins. The concept is a reimagined contemporary afternoon tea scene, with two subjects, incorporating elements of a music video shoot (slow motion movement shots), and blending closeups and ambience shots seamlessly. I’d like it to be cinematic. The final edited product should be no more than 30-45 seconds.

Please contact me for further details.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Music Video, Documentary, Video Production, Photography, Color Grading, Cinematography, Video Editing, Event Highlights Video, Film Editing, Film Production, Product Photography, Event Photography, Videography

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:22 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
*Reoccurring work*

We are looking for a skilled and creative editor to edit short-form snippets from our podcast. The editor will be responsible for making the snippets engaging and captivating by adding animations, sound effects and humour to the clip.

Think Ali Abdaal style (https://www.youtube.com/@aliabdaal/shorts)
but funnier.

Premiere Pro / After Effects Editors ONLY as they will supply the project file after the edit. We are looking for someone with an organised workflow, so if we need to open the project file, it is easy to understand and manoeuvre.

We are looking for someone available to edit 2-3 short-form podcasts a week.
1 Short = 40 USD (open for negotiation)

Skills required:

- Pr Pro/ After Effects Experience
- Motion Graphics / Animation
- Sound effects
- Attention to detail
- Fluent in English

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Podcast Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Podcast Production
Country: AUS

item.title: Video editing - 4 hours raw footage to go to 2 to 3 hours - Upwork
item.description:
we have 4 hours footage on SD cards. It's the Coast to Coast walk in the UK. We want to:

1. edit for continuity not losing people shots
2. introduce a sound track if possible
3. insert title, plus day 1 walking from to and how far, and so on over some 16 days

The walk is a very personal experience for each walker and the people shots are very important. The scenery is magnificent and we need to ensure that shots showing the variety of terrain covered isn't lost.
we also had one walker sick one day. He was the videographer. We have some still shots from that day we'd like to insert.

Totally open to a conversation.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Badass Video Editor for YouTube Talking Head Videos & Podcasts - Upwork
item.description:
About the Agency:
We are a content marketing agency formed in January 2019 to fill a gap in the market as it relates to podcasting. There were many agencies that handled the audio editing and distribution of a podcast but few, if any, did so holistically - providing services such as audio, video, graphic design, social media, blogs, email copy, etc.

We are currently operating as an international team of 21 people from joining in from 11 different countries.


Overview of the Role:
We are seeking a talented YouTube Editor to join our team. This role involves working closely with our team to produce high-quality talking head and podcast content. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to bring creative ideas to life.

Hours: Flexible

Requirements:

- Experience as a Video Editor doing talking head and/or video podcasts on YouTube
- Next-level editing skills
- Strong visual storytelling skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- EXCELLENT communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a team.

Hiring Process:

STAGE 1: We vet down the list of candidates based on profile, portfolio, and applicable experience

STAGE 2: We will vet your skillset.

STAGE 3: The remaining candidates complete a PAID test project.

STAGE 4: Video interview.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$22.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 01:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
